ob.title: OK aperi sue portai
ob.content:
Sidiurne, nov gaset av esed funded, Oranjbosk Kelkfoa. Kuale nom sugest, it publikero avisi di Oranjbosk e Hellcraft kuale integr -- kelkfoa, in intervali neregular.

Kausi pro it av esed ekspliked per redakter shefik de gaset, xadrezo: "Problem prinsipal ko proyekti diurnalistik kuale istkosi es sempre, ke mi no fakte konos su kekos mi deberio raportar. It es, nokos sufisik aksid a yustifikar gaset, eske vo konos? Ma ad el sem temp, kuale fresk it eserio avar telkos."

On visero, eske ist proyekt avero sukses, u faliero manku reson de esar.

en.title: OK opens its doors
en.content:
Today, a new newspaper has been founded, the Orangewood Occasional. As the name suggests, it will publish news about Orangewood and Hellcraft at large -- occasionally, in irregular intervals.

The reasons for this have been explained by the newspaper's editor-in-chief, xadrezo: "The main problem with journo projects like these is always that I don't actually know what to report on. It's like not enough stuff happens to justify a newspaper, y'know? But at the same time, how cool would it be to have that."

We will see, if this project will succeed, or fail due to lack of a reason to exist.
